greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n = A259934(k) then a(n) = k, otherwise largest k such that A259934(k) is an ancestor of n in a tree generated by edge-relation A049820(child) = parent.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..32767
formula: If A262693(n) = 1 then a(n) = A262694(n) [i.e., when n = A259934(k), a(n) = k], otherwise a(n) = a(A049820(n)).
a(A262896(n)) = n. [This sequence works as a left inverse for injection A262896.]
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 07 2015
